greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, that transforms diagonals in the array A158825 of coefficients of successive iterations of x*C(x) where C(x) is the Catalan function (A000108).
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n), n = 1..496 (rows 1..31).
example: Array A158825 of coefficients in iterations of x*C(x) begins:
This triangle transforms diagonals of A158825 into each other:
program: (PARI) {T(n, k)=local(F=x, CAT=serreverse(x-x^2+x*O(x^(n+2))), M, N, P, m=max(n, k)); M=matrix(m+2, m+2, r, c, F=x; for(i=1, r+c-2, F=subst(F, x, CAT)); polcoeff(F, c)); N=matrix(m+1, m+1, r, c, M[r, c]); P=matrix(m+1, m+1, r, c, M[r+1, c]); (P~*N~^-1)[n+1, k+1]}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 28 2009, Mar 29 2009
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 04 2010, to make entries, offset, b-file and link to b-file all consistent.
